result.execSummary:
The defendant Kenneth S. Milton was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Armed Robbery [Modifiers: Repeater], a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.32(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges.  If unpaid financial obligations remain at discharge or revocation, civil judgment to be entered.

Obey all of the rules and regulations of supervising probation agent.
*  Pay supervision fees.
*  Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges.
*  Submit to a DNA sample and pay surcharge.
May not have contact with Victim.  DOC shall notify the Court of any new arrest or criminal charge made against the Deft.

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  Special Pros K R Wells appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Hilary Edwards.  Sentencing arguments made. Voting acknowledgment.

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lema.  ADA Burgoyne appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Hilary Edwards.  Victim rights compliance.  Case is resolved.  Information amended to reflect correct elements of the crime.  Deft pleads guilty; found guilty by the Court.  PSI ordered.  Sentencing set for 8/24/15 @ 1:30pm.
